Package fr.inria.lille.shexjava.schema

Class ShexSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.inria.lille.shexjava.schema.ShexSchema
  • public class ShexSchema
extends Object
    A ShEx schema. An instance of this class represents a well-defined schema, that is, all shape labels are defined, and the set of rules is stratified. All the verification on the set of rules id done in the constructor. The stratification is a most refined stratification.
    Author:
    Iovka Boneva, Antonin Durey, Jérémie Dusart

      • ShexSchema

           throws UndefinedReferenceException,

      • ShexSchema

        public ShexSchema​(org.apache.commons.rdf.api.RDF rdfFactory,
                  Map<Label,ShapeExpr> rules)
           throws UndefinedReferenceException,
                  CyclicReferencesException,
                  NotStratifiedException
        The constructor try to instantiate a well-defined schema. Label are generated for all shapeExpr and tripleExpr without and ID. References are resolved and a verification that there is no cycles in the references is performed. The stratification of the set of rules is stratified is computed. Rules cannot be modified after initialization
        Parameters:
        rules -
        Throws:
        UndefinedReferenceException
        CyclicReferencesException
        NotStratifiedException
